text: Sufenta Gepts : effect site Concentration 5ug/mi 250ug amp dilute to 50mls Cet on induction 0,5ng/ml = 20ug bolus After induction come down to cet of 0,2ng/ml = 20 ug per hour target . Set decrement concentration to 0,08ng/ml Need about 3 hour infusion for good tail . After 60ug (3 hours) sufficient analgesia
